name: Lisa brin
text: Loved the food the place was very clean the staff was very nice had to where a mask inside of course.but can take it off to eat of course

name: Megan Stout
text: It’s a good price on food and beverages. You can always order a pizza of your choosing if it isn’t on the buffet line. The drinks are cheap and pretty strong so I always enjoy coming to the bar as well. The staff have always been very friendly.

name: Donna Marie Hamed
text: Love this place!  Fantastic bar to watch the Miami Dolphins!  Crazy good salad and the variety of pizza makes it more fun.  As long as they are staffed, everything has been perfect!

name: Tammy Smith
text: 08/30/20 We ate lunch at HH around 1:30. There appeared to be only one waitress taking care of the large dining area and it was obvious that she was having a hard time keeping up with the guests and cleaning off the tables. The soup and …More

name: He Said She Said
text: The young lady that is working the floor kept busy providing plates and anything else that was needed by all the customers she was quick friendly and accommodating. The pizza was good the taco pizza is definitely my favorite. if found this review helpful please give us a thumbs up and follow us as we travel this amazing countryside

name: Luis Paul Alarcon
text: Very good store  It's buffet and all the pizzas very good.  But the best is attention.  I recommend that you attend the Harleigh girl, super special and attentive and if it is the first time will explain everything.  I would go back again.

name: Whitney Wood
text: Sr 79 hungry howies is the best. Always has a clean and fresh salad bar. Pizza is always fresh and amazing as well. Staff is friendly and dinning area is clean and well maintained

name: mike straw
text: Best salad bar around and always willing to make me a special pie.  Kimberly is the best server too!

name: Shawn Cross
text: Great place to watch the games! Nice sized TVs and good drink specials!

name: Star Soto
text: We arrived with the wrestling team, coaches and parents after a big match. All the guys were VERY hungry. We called ahead to let them know how many of us would be there.  They had a row of tables all lined up for the kids ready to go with …More

name: Jimmyj Irons
text: Had problem with and order that was over cook they fixed it Immediately with a smile 😊 alway great service when I go there messed up once but they fixed it fast

name: Marcia jackson
text: Everything was good. The food hot the salad bar full and fesh. Everyone please and good service.

name: donald boyd
text: Food was good great facility largest hungry Howie's in the State service was good just poor attitude with management

name: Shirley Lewis
text: The dining area was very clean and fresh, the waitresses were very well mannered and helpful. The Buffett was fresh and freshly prepared at your pace. Will be back!!!

name: Nikki Walsh
text: Made my family's order perfectly!!thank you so much to getting everything excalty how we like it !!!☺☺

name: Renay Matthews
text: The only reason I give 4 and not 5 stars is because of the price. $13 for a pizza buffet seems a bit high to me. The pizza is good and the pasta I love. They have a decent salad bar. I went alone and there is no setting for two, only 4 or …More

name: Yenniffer Thomas
text: Best pizza place ever, big menu of pizza, cant believe the price is so low i wish i can eat pizza everyday...

name: Matthew
text: Beside good pizza, they have a fantastic salad bar and soups.

name: Chelsea Cantwell
text: Just a great family style buffet and all the things I tried were fresh and delicious. Staff was very nice as well

name: Rosaura Rodriguez
text: Pick up and Dine-in ....good service  Pizzas are made very well and look appetizing , I cannot speak for buffet they offer because I've never opted for it.

name: mari cruz
text: Love the soup very good service

name: Shawn Marie Pecararo
text: THIS PLACE IS AMAZING!  they have a full bar, arcade games, salad bar and buffet. wish there were more Hungry Howie's like this one. staff is great, drinks and food were good

name: Donna A
text: We got lucky when we stopped in here. We were looking for a salad. Bonus! We got pizza and dessert to go along with the salad bar. We didn't order off the menu but the pizza and salad bar are definitely worth the price. I will definitely go back here. The staff was very friendly as well.

name: chad mitchell
text: The waitstaff here is incredible and they are doing as much as they can to keep everybody safe ALSO!!! Right now freeb drinks with buffet..

name: Paula Grant
text: Great service and food. Great family atmosphere!

name: jonathan boz
text: Good lunch but not much variety

name: Jasmine Franklin
text: Kaela is such an amazing server. She took care of the entire dining room very gracefully and wonderfully. She made our experience the beat it could be. Thank you for giring such competent staff.

name: Christopher Taranto
text: Always yummy pizza and friendly staff

name: Timothy Wert
text: I was surprised by this place. It reminds me of how CiCis has their buffet set-up. However, the pizza here is way better. I was impressed all the way around. I do recommend. Why do we not have one of these in Pinellas County? Please bring …More

name: Dawn Bock
text: Excellent buffet! Lots of choices, fresh vegetables daily. The buffet includes a salad bar, choices of soups, tons of pizza options,  dessert pizzas and cinnamon rolls all for less than $10 per adult. We're so glad we tried it.  You can order food too but with such good choices I'd rather go for the buffet and try many things.

name: Cory Evans
text: Disappointed to arrive at our usual stop coming back from the beach yesterday, to be turned away because they now are closing the buffet at 9p on Saturday? I imagine that this is cOVID related, but please update hours! Still posted on building as 10p with no other noting on the door windows.

name: Robin B
text: We are never disappointed with the food and service. We like to meet our Tampa relatives here, as we both drive an hour. The taco pizza was awesome.

name: Katherine Ganey
text: Always enjoy this location. Food is fresh and you can ask for any pizza on the menu and they'll make it fresh.

name: Alexandria Harrison
text: This place was great. The pizza was hot and fresh. They also had a great variety of pizza and soups. The salad bar was good too. It was very clean and had very friendly and attentive staff. If you're into sports, they offer a variety of sports on a majority of the televisions.

name: Marlene Behrenwald
text:
Fine place to grab a quick salad or pizza slice of your choice . My grandchildren loved the food as well as the arcade games in the adjoining room .
.

name: Savannah Greene
text: This place is great, their buffet is super cheap and super yummy. They also have a small arcade room and bar here.

name: Marlene Black
text: Amazing selections of about a 40 ft. Hot pizza buffet,soups, dessert pizzas and pasta. Some are thin crust and regular crust. Fresh  complete salad bar with cold crisp greens...Well stocked.Full bar. Exceptional quality and service. Their cheddar broccoli soup is "to die for".

name: Sally Gremaux
text: We have been here numerous times and both the pizza and salad bars are kept well stocked. Salad bar is fresh and pizzas hot. Good assortment and everything we 'have had has been good.

name: Zander Burden
text: I LOVE HUNGRY HOWIES ITS SO GOOD

name: Nala MuchLove
text: Sports bar meets pizza joint.  Very large place.  Great for parties & large groups of people.  The staff was friendly and very courteous.  TV's every where. They show all college & pro football games.  Even has a full bar filled with more TVs.  They went all put to turn this pizza buffet into a sports bar.

name: Jim Staffiles
text: Servers were all very nice. There was plenty of pizza and the salad bar was good

name: Jason Conley
text:
Its hungry howies but all you can eat.
It is a sit down restaurant with booth seating.
Full bar …More

name: Billy Floyd
text: Great, friendly service.  Awesome HOT pizza and selections to choose from.  Three different soups, awesome salad bar and I love their cinnamon twirls.  All under $10 bucks!

name: Roy Barnes
text: If you like pizza this is the place to go.

name: Lindsey Zimmerman
text: Service was terrible had to wait forever and then beg the waiter for more plates but the  food was even worse. Bit into a cinnamon roll that was burnt on the outside and cold on the inside pizza looked like it had been sitting for hours and they were all the same all around not a good experience

name: jeremy rhodes
text: Good food. Like this much better then the Bradenton location to be honest

name: mellissa loyd
text: Great waitress , best variety of food.

name: Double O Six
text: I am not sure why there are not more hungry Howies buffets around this place is absolutely amazing!!! If you love a sports bar setting plus all you can eat pizza and salad bar you have found the right place (& beer) Any opportunity we have …More

name: Don Kerner
text: Great place, buffet pizza, pasta and salad bar. For the adults there is a bar attached. Wish we had one here in Homestead.

name: Patricia Rittenhouse
text: Hungry Howie's has been here for many years. My family has always used it as a meeting place for all occasions. There's something for everyone on their menu. Clean, good service & plenty of seating for their reasonably priced menu 💜

name: James Rester Jr
text: Great service! Thank you Zoie👍

name: Lisa A
text: Wish the game room was a little bigger but over all we really enjoyed our night & dinner.

name: S M
text: Ive been to a few Hungry Howies and always love them. This location serves typical pizza types though and rarely any of the specialty pizzas. When you ask for another kind it takes awhile. 4 stars because i like the food, wish they gave better variety though.

name: Richard Watjen
text: Huge all you can eat buffet. Food is good. Plus they have a bar if your into alcohol.

name: Christine Coblentz
text: Food was good, prices very fair.  They have sweet tea!

name: Omar T
text: Food is always fresh, they also take requests for example...buffalo chicken, taco pizza, etc.

name: Timm Perkins
text: Good salad bar and selection of pizza. Didn't like the cinnamon rolls.

name: Desiree Ramey
text: Nice bar I didnt even know was in there

name: Kristina Smithman
text: Good selection and everything was hot and fresh even though it wasn't a busy time. Very tasty!

name: Rob Puchinsky
text: Food is okay, great place for a cheap bite to eat with the little ones, as they have the buffet and there is arcade games for entertainment

name: Cheryl A Wilson Keiger
text: The bartender's need to have some printed material on how to make specific speciality drinks a lemon drop martini should not be served dry dirty with olives. Was not pleased

name: Jeffery Willett
text: Awesome AS ALWAYS

name: Michael Kaffenberger
text: Went on an Saturday evening before 7pm. The food and service was great. Like this place a lot. The bar is separated from the main dining room and it really does help the atmosphere if you're looking to be away from commotion. However, the …More

name: Krystle Butland
text: Always a great time here!!!

name: Beth Andrew
text: Good variety. Salad bar very fresh. Dessert pizzas had a little too much crust for the amount of topping. Overall, great experience.

name: Danny Ford
text: Very friendly staff.  Food was ok for a quick buffet meal.  I enjoy the taco and dessert pizza the best.

name: Nik Lyons
text: Walk in waddle out good times

name: gavin newton
text: There food is so amazing and you will get your moneys worth for it

name: Frank Crehore
text: Good pizza, nice service. Great place for after the game.

name: Ira Jenkins
text: Went with soccer team after the game. Staff was excellent, place was clean and there was plenty of pizza available.

name: Stephanie Gonzalez
text: Our waitress was extremely nice and helpful. The buffet was full. The food was good. Overall everything looked pretty clean. I was satisfied with my visit.

name: Denise Varney
text: Loved it!! Great food, great service! We were treated well.

name: Julie Anne Mullin
text: We go here every Saturday evening for college football. Natalie is one of the best servers ever. Even when she's the only one taking care of the whole bar side and high tops, she never seems overwhelmed, she makes sure every every guest is taken care of, always with a smile and a great attitude. She's amazing.

name: Brian Tullis
text: Absolutely the worst place to eat at. Employees are not that friendly, nor do they care about their jobs. Got a salad and someone decided to cut the bad part off the onion, and diced up the rest of it and put it in with the fresh …More

name: Lisa Cole
text: I love the all u can eat buffet here. It's one of our favorite places to go as a family. We all like it. There's lot's of variety. Always something for everyone, even the pickiest eater

name: Neil Stocks
text: We go here every year on vacation.  The pizza is always hot and fresh and they make the best Zesty Pepperoni pizza I have ever had.  As far as service goes, it is generally seat yourself, the host staff is fast, attentive, amd friendly.  All around a good place to take the family for dinner at a reasonable price.

name: Kathy Kelley
text: Good place for quick pizza, good selection of different toppings.

name: Robert Stout
text: The bar area is full service, great place to hang out, reasonable prices!

name: Renee Martin
text: Very clean, great selection me staff are all very friendly and helpful.

name: Chas Giltner
text: The Buffet here is the bomb.  Order your favorite, take the variety, salad, soups...is good.  HH is awesome.

name: Jourdan Kipp
text: My 2 year olds favorite restaurant. Their salad bar is my favorite. Great staff and clean atmosphere.

name: Tim Krause
text: Like their cold pitchers of beer!

name: reinaldo hernandez
text: I had the buffet and it was very good,  plenty of selections.

name: Torrie Kronk
text: Love the buffet, very filling great choices friendly staff

name: Hector Hernandez
text: Good menu,good place, good people and I recommend to everyone. Thanks.

name: Raza Ali
text: Nice all u can eat pizzas and can get custom orders as well! Highly recommend.

name: Laura Anthony
text: Typical Hungry Howie's. Hot pizza, good salad bar, usually lots of kids.

name: April Fusillo
text: The pasta was extremely dry even through rush hour dinner ☹  everything else was really good.  I liked the options on the salad bar and the strudel bread is better than the cinnamon buns!

name: Lynette Dygert
text: The soup was great and my kids loved the buffet of choices. The dessert was very poor quality. The line was long to get dessert, as everyone wanted to try almost every one at the same time. The fruit and chocolate desserts tasted like …More

name: Steve Corp
text: Great lunch buffet with a wonderful salad bar. Always a great choice.

name: Mike Shoemaker
text: Always good food and service

name: SmoothPink Haiti
text: Literally just left here. Spent $138.62😤 Food was good except the stale desserts and salty soups.🙅🏾 The components of the broccoli and cheddar soup were separating and leaving a gritty ring of scum on the bowl.🤔 The staff were very rude …More

name: Nick Johnson
text: Great service! Super friendly staff! Classic Hungry Howies food. One of the most consistent locations 👍🏼

name: Matt Mylett
text: Always fresh and hot. A great spot to catch the game and/or take the kids. Wide selection of pizza styles in addition to pasta, a fully stocked salad bar and the best part - Desert Pizza!

name: Matt Martin
text: Pizza is okay. It is a lot like CiCi's. They have dramatically improved their salad bar which is a plus. They have a wide variety of pizza and you can personally request one if they have the available toppings.

name: Pickle
text: Good food and good service

name: Shari Brown
text: What a nice clean Restaurant.  The salad bar is fresh.  More pizza than you can shake a stick at.  If you want something different from the large selection of pizza's on the huge buffet, they will make one just for you!

name: Naresh Dobariya
text: Best fresh salads and too many choices of pizza in buffet.  One can order custom pizza too. Excellent

name: Amber Watts
text: Nothing but salad for this wheat sensitive gal.  Everyone else was so full and not too expensive!

name: Dorothy McGarrity
text: Way over priced and food not good

name: Ronda Terrell
text: went in at 11 am no pizza ready. at 11:15 pizza ready. finished at 11:30 only cinnamon rolls were ready couldn't wait on other desserts to be cooked. they open at 11! waitress was very nice.

name: Jaye Bowen
text: Salad bar is decent. They had 2 different soups which were good. Two kinds of pasta, one with marinara and one with alfredo which were fair. Pizza was good with several different options. Prices are very reasonable. For 2 people having the …More

name: Matthew Shoemaker
text: Their staff is better than the establishment itself. Not necessarily because they are dirty or dont have good hygiene, its just an inherently dirty place due to the children and very greasy food, as well as the 'serve yourself' nature of …More

name: Bryan Makowski
text: Always great Clam Chowder and Lobster Bisque. Parmesan crusted fish was excellent.

name: James Bradin
text: The team always love our trip there.   Great selection and good pizza for a decent price.

name: Steven Laureys
text: The food look great and the  Hostess was very kind. Unfortunately I was on a time crunch and just wanted to get some pizza to go from the buffet .   Not sure why with this is not something that they offer.

name: Cameron Mckevitt
text: Great food good prices

name: Susan Dunlow
text: The buffet here is always clean, well stocked and reasonably priced for a chain restaurant.  They were announcing the pizza flavor each time they put out a new one.  The spinach pizza is the best.

name: Lisa Kruger
text: Great food for an all you can eat pizza and salad buffet. There was a really nice selection of items on the salad bar and I liked the announcements when fresh pizza was coming out. We were just passing through on our way to Siesta Key, but I hope they build a Hungry Howie's buffet near where we live too!

name: Jerry Kraner
text: This chain of restaurants is a daily staple for me .  There everywhere constantly good food. Little pricey cause I eat 4 pieces and a salad now it's 13$ for lunch I guess. I'm just saying

name: walter shorf
text: I love Hungry Howie's!

name: Naida Majka
text: Always a pleasure to go and have a lunch or dinner. Staff and workers are friendly and accomodating

name: Gamal Chtay
text: Last night with FAMILY, we all had the sorriest ice tea no flavor not even color, then we had to get the ice in one machine and the ice tea and sodas on the OTHER machine. in addition to that we ORDERED Food from the menu and we know for …More

name: M. Sato
text: Pizza was ok for buffet. Serving area was clean. Salad bar was fresh with lots of topping choices. Our server Linda was awesome! She deserves 5 stars. Why 3? It’s the system and price. We been to different chain with same concept. Their …More

name: Natalee Shelton
text: I ordered a pizza for pickup. Apparently there was some sort of miscommunication because when my boyfriend went to pick it up, they said "there is no order in the system".  When I called back to see what happened to my order, the employee …More

name: Brett Barber
text: I visited Hungry Howie's many times in the past few years and every single time it is delicious and cost-efficient. There's always plenty of pizza even when it's at its busiest time and we always enjoy our stay. They always have something …More

name: Randy Fales
text: Always a winner here. I go out of my way to visit this location even though there is a closer one to me. Live how friendly and helpful the staff are. This is a staple for the family when we can't decide on what to get. Definitely will be back here again.

name: Diana Urrelys
text: Great service very clean alot to choose from

name: Amanda Post
text: Always good food and clean enviroment. Great for a quick dinner.

name: oseas santos
text: The best place to eat pizza.

name: Don Eddington
text: Huge variety of pizza, soups and salad bar, with a spring mix, not your typical iceberg lettuce. If you want something else in your pizza, just ask and in about 7 minutes, boom, you got it. It's hard to stop eating, it's that good.

name: Ali Labeeb Alkoka
text:
Great Buffet. I enjoy the fact that you can get your own drinks and food without having to wait on anyone else period.
Wonderful selection of different pizzas on an open buffet. There is plenty of …More

name: Jack B.
text: Two words. Chocolate. Pizza. That's all folks.

name: Quinn G
text: This place is amazing. We were in town for the weekend and stumbled upon this gem. This is the only hungry howies buffet I believe in the entire state of fl. Our waitress was so pleasant we ate here 2 nights in a row ( we like pizza). Huge …More

name: Michelle Rowley
text: Love the salad bar, and the soup bar. White pizza, and spinach pizza is very good.  Pepperoni rolls are a must have! Bartender, Linda M., always personable, and ready to take good care of all your needs!

name: Doll The Wolf
text: Lots of choices for pizza. Salad bar was good. The only thing lacking was some sort of atmosphere.

name: Jill Chattman
text: Great place, friendly staff, good food!

name: Sung Kim
text: Great food at great price. Selection is good. Wish they had better salad bar and offer their curly fries in buffet

name: Julie Mccuish
text: Good food for the price yum!

name: Eric DiGruttolo
text: I have been here quite a few times and it is always good and has a large selection with the buffet and salad bar and soup. Yum

name: Maria N
text: Was quite a wounderful suprise to find this place. Salad bar with numerous fresh vegetables. All you can eat pizza!!! Staff very friendly and attentive. Will be back again.

name: Jenifer Fosnaugh
text: Great pizza buffet. I have been to several run by HH. This one is by far my favorite. It is large, clean, and the pizza was very fresh.

name: Brandie Christman
text: Clean and not over crowed great place

name: Eric Potts
text: Subs are out of this world

name: Kristy Gibson
text: They didn't have any fresh sweets

name: Red R
text: Plenty of pizza to choose from!! All hot & fresh!!

name: Elaine Justus
text: Great place to eat.  Nice fresh salad bar.  Lots of different types of pizzas.  And soups

name: Chris Keeping
text: So many choices!! Everything was delicious...will definitely go back

name: Michael May
text: Good buffet and bar with many TVs for sports.

name: Breno
text:
This is a place to get a quick grab with friends
But not to be impressed. Customer service is okay, but some employees act weird.

name: Sheryl Vanbibber
text: Food was Excellent,Waitress gave Great Service,Will be back again for sure,We are from New Orleans,La.  Who Dat !!! Love the tripped out Ladies Bathroom,took pictures,All is missing is DISCO BALL.

name: Emily Horton
text: It's really good if you want to just hang with friends and chill and the people here are so nice, sweet, helpful, ect if you are looking for good pizza and great people here is were you go

name: John Eiklor
text: I have been going to this Hungry Howie's for years, predating the new location actually. The price has crept up now to the point that it the value is boarder line IMO. Now your check will have an undisclosed and undiscussed 2% service …More

name: D S
text: The best hungry Howie's in town. Plus they have big screens and a full bar. Standard buffet items but more of them and more rotation because they are busy. Definitely the one to go to if you're looking for a nice salad bar and pizza buffet 👌

name: Young Kim
text: Good price and fresh made pizza.

name: Shauna Smith
text: Lots of options. Buffet, soup and salad bar. Clean, large space so can accommodate larger parties. Huge tvs all around the room. Has a bar with beer on tap. You can request a special pizza for the buffet when you come in and they will fix …More

name: Colette Lemay
text: Salad bar is always fresh and delicious.  Pizza is great, too.  Price just went up but still a value.

name: Rick Burton
text: Awesome buffet with alot of selections.

name: DAN THE CAB MAN
text: Terrible service. The server asked me if would like to have more tea. I politely said yes. She then asked me do I want it in a to go cup and I said just the regular plastic cup provided. Then she looked at me and said that I was talking to …More

name: Amanda Cineus
text: They used to deliver my pizza and all of a sudden they can't and I only live 2 miles away. And there the closest ones available. I called 3 times and everytime I called the guy on the phone hanged up on me. I just don't understand.

name: Michael Kaiser
text: Cheap comfort food

name: Matthew Delzer
text: Amazing food and has a vast variety of selections. The only thing I can find negative is the stack of plates they give you because some of the plates have a little bit of water on them. Besides that, great service, amazing food, and a great place to eat

name: John Patterson
text: Prices went up to $9.69 for lunch plus $2.59 for a beverage but still a good value for all you can eat. Good variety and salad bar was fresh and well stocked.

name: daniel odell
text: All the pizza was really good and the girls working the dining room were very sweet.  Great time!

name: Terry Mehrman
text: Cheap place to eat,  the  food is pretty good

name: Teresa Vellenga
text: Great food and friendly service

name: Key Wester
text: So this review is for adults going to a kids restaurant. I don't have young kids and have never taken my kids the there. However we have gone here many times. We sit in the bar area where it's usually kid free and have wine and watch sports …More

name: Clarence Love
text:
Ms. Linda M. was the bartender and a fine one at that!
She was friendly, kept our drinks full, and clean plates ready for us to go back to the buffet. Thank you for the great service!

name: Chris Cinelli
text: Best for watching sports at the bar.  Pizza bar is more for the kids unless you don't mind frozen pizza style pizza.  Salad bar was fresh.  Wings were meaty and crispy.

name: Kev From Leesburg
text: For a buffet the pizza is good and fresh. Salad bar has decent options. Soup options and pasta alternatives to pizza. Family friendly with bar area as well. Not overly noisy when busy.

name: Robert sharp
text: Good pizza and a fresh salad bar, good place for lunch.

name: Stephanie Beardsley
text: I got a custom pizza on the buffet and it was awesome. Great customer service!

name: R. Cooper
text: Review is more the service than the pizza.  Pizza is standard chain pizza.  The wings are better than most chains as they are fried and not baked.  The people working there are nice and friendly. …More

name: Brian Winemiller
text: Fun and inviting me to.

name: Marc Erwin
text: Nice building. Nice servers. Really marginal pizza.

name: Sydna Gibson
text: The food is great, however I ask for a small glas s of water in the drive-throu. I  was told that I would have to come on the inside and eat from the buffet and that the water would be $.50.  I know not to go there again.

name: Adam Germino
text: So we had a soccer game up the street from this Hungry Howies. We decided to go there however my daughter didn't want pizza. So we made a stop by the Culvers in the same plaza and then proceeded to Hungry Howies. We started to sit down and …More

name: Clinton Hayes
text: The best HH buffet I have ever been to

name: Julie Salyer
text: Great food for the price.

name: Ashlee Shearer
text: Awesome variety of pizza with many toppings they have a great salad bar and their pasta and cheese bread is one of my favorite except nothing beats their chocolate pizza staff is always friendly and fast

text: I haven't had a bad experience in 4 years since in or carry out. Great place

name: Brian Trout
text: Grear buffet. A little expensive but worth it

name: Serena Fincel
text: They had a clean upbeat atmosphere.

name: Don L
text: Salad & pizza were fresh. A great buffet value.

name: Amanda Owens
text: This was an amazing experience.   The salad bar had a wide variety of fresh veggies with quality dressing! The pizza buffet was amazing as well. I wish you had a location in Orlando and Kissimmee!

name: Hungry Howie's Communications
text: This is one of our favorite locations! With a fully stocked salad and soup bar, alongside a hot and fresh pizza and pasta bar, this place has something to please any appetite. The big screen Tv's surrounding the dining area and full liquor …More

name: Brandy Turner
text: My family and I love this place. We live in Orlando where there aren't any Hungry howies buffets. Whenever we are in Bradenton, we make it a point to visit this hungry howies. The servers are always welcoming and kind. The food is good and the prices are even better.

name: orbitx_fn
text: Great for kids! And great for a large group because there is something for everyone

name: Trainer Dan
text: Great food... And a sports bar. Yum

name: Deana Conrad
text:
Best Hungry Howies around
Fresh delicious service top notch.

name: Matthew Davis
text: I've been to a few of these at this one takes the cake it is immaculate inside and has a large array of different dishes to try including a salad bar and bar with bartender honestly the other two Hungry Howie's pizza and salad bar places …More

text: Really good customer service, keto friendly options, really good taste😍😘💕
